screenshot.title: Screenshots
screenshot.explanation: Would you like to add screenshots to your audit?

browsers.title: Browser
browsers.subtitle: Browser choice
browsers.explanation: The browser to use for the audit.

reference.title: References base
reference.explanation: Choose the guidelines you want to apply to your audit.

mainReference.title: Choice of main guidelines
mainReference.explanation: The repository that will be displayed in the dashboard.

tests.title: List of tests
tests.explanation: The following configuration can be modified in the project's settings.

pages.title: Audit pages configuration
pages.subtitle: Pages to test
pages.explanation: Enter at least one page adress. Expected format is : 'http://www.tanaguru.com'

waitTime.title: Wait time (for JS frameworks like Angular, React...)
waitTime.label: Wait time before auditing after the dom loaded (in milliseconds)
waitTime.formHelp: The value must be a number between 0 (excluded) and 10 000 milliseconds (ms). Example: 2 seconds = 2000 ms. Input content : 2000

parameters.labelMaxDepthHelp: Crawler max depth in pages (the value must be an integer between 1 and 10)
parameters.labelMaxDurationHelp: Crawler max duration in seconds (the value must be a number between 0.1 and 86400).
parameters.labelMaxDocumentHelp: Crawler max pages (the value must be an integer between 1 and 1000).
parameters.labelInclusionRegexHelp: Only audit URLs containing one or more given strings separated by a ';'
parameters.labelExclusionRegexHelp: Exclude URLs containing one or more given strings separated by a ';'

basicAuth.explanation: Please provide basic authentification informations to allow quick and easy protected access to the audit's pages. If login page is included in the 'Pages to test' section (#2), leave 'URL' field empty.
basicAuth.urlError: URL should belong to specified domain and should not be listed in the pages to test.
basicAuth.loginError: Login should be longer than 3 characters
basicAuth.passwordError: Password should be longer than 5 characters

error.formError: The form has not been properly filled. Check your answers for mistakes or empty fields.
error.auditType: Please choose a type for your audit.
error.auditName: Please enter a name for your audit.
error.typeError: Please select the type of audit you wish to execute.
error.waitTimeError: Please enter a numeric value between 0 (excluded) and 10 000.
error.scenarioNameError: Please give a name to your scenario
error.fileNameError: Please give a name to your file
error.seedsError: You cannot audit a different website than the one declared on the project.
error.emptyUrlError: The first slot has to be filled.
error.emptyUrlsError: Please enter at least one url.
error.bpError: Invalid breakpoint, please enter a numeric value between 1 and 2048.
error.auditReferences: Please choose at least one guidelines.
error.crawlerDuration: Please enter a numeric value between 0.1 et 86400 for the crawler max duration in seconds.
error.crawlerDepth: Please enter an integer between 1 and 10 for the crawler max depth in pages.
error.crawlerDocument: Please enter an integer between 1 and 1000 for the crawler max pages.
error.noMainReference: No guidelines have been given to conduct this audit
error.noUsableReference: No valid guidelines have been given to conduct this audit
